new_signals.title: DeepSeek releases breakthrough AI training method mHC for efficient model scaling
new_signals.summary: Chinese AI startup DeepSeek published Manifold-Constrained Hyper-Connections (mHC) training method in January 2026, described as a striking breakthrough for scaling models without instability at minimal cost.

new_signals.title: CES 2026: Physical AI and humanoid robots dominate with 40 companies showcasing
new_signals.summary: CES 2026 (Jan 6-9) marked physical AI as the dominant theme with 40 companies mentioning humanoid robots.

new_signals.title: D-Wave announces acquisition of Quantum Circuits Inc. for $550M to accelerate quantum computing
new_signals.summary: D-Wave announced on Jan 7, 2026 acquisition of Quantum Circuits Inc. for $550M with initial dual-rail system planned for general availability in 2026.

new_signals.title: IBM predicts quantum advantage verification by end of 2026 with 7,500-gate systems
new_signals.summary: IBM anticipates first verified quantum advantage cases by end of 2026, with future Nighthawk iterations delivering up to 7,500 gates.

new_signals.title: 양자컴퓨터 2026년 상용화 원년, IBM '강한 양자 우위' 선언
new_signals.summary: IBM은 CES 2026에서 2026년 말까지 '강한 양자 우위(strong quantum advantage)' 실현을 공식 예측했으며, 양자컴퓨터가 슈퍼컴을 넘어서는 원년이 될 것으로 전망.

new_signals.title: NVIDIA introduces Cosmos physical AI models and announces Vera Rubin AI superchip in production
new_signals.summary: At CES 2026, NVIDIA released Cosmos and GR00T open models for robot learning, Isaac Lab-Arena for evaluation, and OSMO edge-to-cloud framework. Announced Vera Rubin next-gen AI superchip platform in full production.

new_signals.title: CRISPR epigenetic editing breakthrough: gene activation without DNA cutting
new_signals.summary: UNSW Sydney researchers developed new CRISPR-based epigenetic editing that switches genes on/off without cutting DNA by removing chemical tags.

new_signals.title: Neuralink plans high-volume brain-computer interface production with automated surgery in 2026
new_signals.summary: Neuralink announced plans to begin high-volume production and fully automated surgical procedures for brain-computer interface devices by 2026.

new_signals.title: FCC approves SpaceX plan to deploy 7,500 additional Starlink satellites, total 15,000
new_signals.summary: FCC approved SpaceX deployment of 7,500 more Gen2 Starlink satellites on Jan 10, 2026, bringing total to 15,000 worldwide.

new_signals.title: Commonwealth Fusion Systems SPARC reactor targets first plasma in 2026
new_signals.summary: Commonwealth Fusion Systems plans to complete SPARC commissioning by end of 2025 and generate first plasma in 2026.

new_signals.title: AI agents market to surge from $7.8B to $52B by 2030, 40% enterprise adoption in 2026
new_signals.summary: Agentic AI market projected to surge from $7.8B today to $52B by 2030. Gartner predicts 40% of enterprise applications will embed AI agents by end of 2026.

new_signals.title: LongBio longevity biotech positioned for breakout at JP Morgan 2026 conference
new_signals.summary: LongGame Longevity Biotech Demo Day took place Jan 9, 2026 ahead of JP Morgan conference, signaling convergence of longevity with mainstream biotech.

new_signals.title: AI can now design proteins and DNA, scientists warn biosecurity rules urgently needed
new_signals.summary: AI technology can now design entirely novel synthetic molecules from DNA to proteins, with relative novices able to design using open source AI software.

new_signals.title: TSMC revenue beats estimates, AI chip demand outstrips supply through 2026
new_signals.summary: TSMC reported Jan 9, 2026 revenue topping estimates with sustained AI spending. 2025 revenue hit record $113B (36% YoY increase).

new_signals.title: Cellular agriculture moves beyond startup phase to public-sector institutional backing
new_signals.summary: At 2026 Tufts Future Food Innovation Day (January), experts noted cellular agriculture shifting from startup economics to public-sector and institutional backing.

new_signals.title: Textile recycling technologies to process 8M tons waste annually by 2030, up from <1M today
new_signals.summary: 2026 textile recycling landscape represents maturation toward true circular material cycles with chemical depolymerization, fiber regeneration, automated sorting.

new_signals.title: Global venture capital deployment expected to increase 10% to high $400B in 2026
new_signals.summary: Global VC deployment expected to increase to high $400B mark in 2026, implying 10% increase. American VCs spent 65.4% of deal money on AI/ML in 2025.

new_signals.title: Goldman Sachs forecasts 2.8% global GDP growth in 2026, recession probability drops to 30%
new_signals.summary: Goldman Sachs projects global GDP increase of 2.8% in 2026 (vs consensus 2.5%). Recession probability over next 12 months fallen to 30% from 40%.

new_signals.title: Enterprise AI spending to increase in 2026 but consolidate to fewer vendors
new_signals.summary: Overwhelming majority of enterprise-focused VCs predict enterprises will increase AI budgets in 2026, but concentrate spending with fewer contracts.

new_signals.title: Seed-stage AI startups receive 42% higher valuations than non-AI peers in 2026
new_signals.summary: Seed-stage AI startups typically receive valuations 42% higher than non-AI peers. Series A median values exceed $50M in 2025, Series B median valuations surged to ~$143M.

new_signals.title: Space economy moving toward $1 trillion valuation by 2040, CES highlights growth
new_signals.summary: Space economy moving toward $1T valuation with JPMorgan calculating growth from $447B to over $1T by 2040. SpaceX projected revenue $15B in 2025, increasing to $22-24B in 2026.

new_signals.title: 2026 will bring widespread job shifts as AI agents automate work, labor analysts warn
new_signals.summary: Labor analysts say 2026 could be when AI technology begins reshaping job market in ways Americans actually feel. 2026 called 'year of agents' as AI expands from productivity to automating work itself.

new_signals.title: AI/ML engineer salaries projected 4.1% increase in 2026, outpacing tech sector average
new_signals.summary: Salaries for AI/ML Engineers and Data Scientists projected 4.1% increase in 2026, significantly outpacing general tech sector average.

new_signals.title: UNEZA Alliance pledges $148B annually for renewable energy, transmission, and storage post-COP30
new_signals.summary: Following COP30, UNEZA Alliance pledged annual commitments of $66B for renewable energy and $82B for transmission and storage.

new_signals.title: IRENA annual assembly Jan 10-12, 2026 to announce progress on tripling renewable energy
new_signals.summary: International Renewable Energy Agency gathering ministers Jan 10-12, 2026 at Abu Dhabi headquarters for annual assembly to announce new insights on COP28 goals.

new_signals.title: GE Vernova debuts 1,500-tonne/year commercial DAC unit in 2026, scalable to 50,000+ tonnes
new_signals.summary: GE Vernova plans to debut 1,500-tonne-per-year commercial DAC unit in 2026 as first true product in their portfolio.

new_signals.title: Direct air capture industry growing with 20+ facilities operational worldwide by 2026
new_signals.summary: More than 20 direct air capture facilities operating worldwide by 2026. Climeworks will deliver 50,000+ tons verified carbon removal credits per year by 2026.

new_signals.title: 한국 기후에너지환경부 2026년 예산 19.2조원, 재생에너지 지원 98.6% 증가
new_signals.summary: 한국 기후에너지환경부 2026년 예산 19.2조원으로 2025년 대비 9.9% 증가. 재생에너지 금융 지원이 2025년 3,263억원에서 2026년 6,480억원으로 98.6% 증가.

new_signals.title: Bangladesh and Pakistan set renewable energy records with solar installations
new_signals.summary: Bangladesh off-grid home solar installations set global record, enabling rapid rural electrification. Pakistan's massive solar panel and battery purchases led country to abandon natural gas.

new_signals.title: Trump administration issues executive order preempting state AI laws, forms litigation task force
new_signals.summary: Trump administration's policy to sustain US global AI dominance through minimally burdensome national framework. Attorney General directed to establish AI Litigation Task Force within 30 days.

new_signals.title: US-China relations enter 2026 with fragile trade truce, tech war intensifying over AI chips
new_signals.summary: US-China relations entering 2026 with paradox: trade thawing in soybeans/metals while tech war over AI chips and Taiwan military balance hardening.

new_signals.title: US plans new semiconductor tariffs on China starting June 2027 after Section 301 investigation
new_signals.summary: US plans to install new tariffs on semiconductors from China starting June 23, 2027 following Section 301 investigation.

new_signals.title: EU AI Act transparency rules take effect August 2026, Digital Omnibus may extend high-risk timeline
new_signals.summary: EU AI Act transparency rules take effect August 2026. Digital Omnibus proposals may extend high-risk processing timeline from Aug 2026 to Dec 2027.

new_signals.title: EU to publish first-ever Fusion Strategy by early 2026 shaping commercial fusion landscape
new_signals.summary: EU's first-ever Fusion Strategy planned for publication by early 2026, which could shape commercial fusion landscape.

new_signals.title: Trump expected to visit China in April 2026, potential turning point in bilateral relations
new_signals.summary: Trump expected to visit China in April 2026 alongside anticipated 2026 leader-level meetings at G-20 and APEC summits.

new_signals.title: Gen Z: 86% striving to reduce screen time, 2026 becomes year of digital minimalism
new_signals.summary: 86% of Gen Z across US and Europe striving to reduce screen time. 2026 is when digital minimalism stops being niche and becomes mainstream movement.

new_signals.title: One-week social media detox reduces anxiety by 16.1%, depression by 24.8% in studies
new_signals.summary: Scientific study found one-week social media detox observed 16.1% reduction in anxiety symptoms and 24.8% decrease in depression symptoms.

new_signals.title: Workplaces adopting email-free Fridays, mental health days, four-day workweek pilots in 2026
new_signals.summary: Organizations responding with four-day workweek pilots, mandatory mental health days, leadership training in psychological safety, and email-free Fridays.

new_signals.title: MZ세대 직장인 66.5%가 워라밸을 괜찮은 일자리 판단 1순위로 선택
new_signals.summary: 괜찮은 일자리 판단 기준 묻는 질문에 응답자 66.5%가 '일과 삶의 균형이 맞춰지는 일자리' 선택. Z세대 32%, 밀레니얼 37%가 '일과 삶의 균형 능력'을 가장 선호.

new_signals.title: Hybrid work becomes new default, full remote reserved for highly skilled technical roles
new_signals.summary: Hybrid work becoming new default with full-time remote opportunities increasingly rare and reserved for highly skilled technical roles.

new_signals.title: AgeTech becomes fastest-growing healthcare innovation sector as aging in place movement booms
new_signals.summary: Aging in place movement giving rise to booming AgeTech market, sector dedicated to tools/technologies helping older adults live independently at home.

new_signals.title: 2026 heralds return of connection as health pillar, community circles and wellness dinners rising
new_signals.summary: 2026 heralds return of connection as pillar of health with community circles, wellness dinners, hobby-based meetups, and restorative group rituals becoming more popular.

new_signals.title: Spiritual wellness apps market to grow from $2.89B in 2026 to $9.91B by 2035
new_signals.summary: Spiritual wellness apps market expected to grow from $2.89B in 2026 to $9.91B by 2035, with meditation and mindfulness apps dominating.

new_signals.title: People choosing spirituality over partying in 2026, seeking mental peace and deeper meaning
new_signals.summary: People choosing spirituality over partying in 2026 seeking mental peace, emotional balance, deeper meaning. Rising stress, anxiety, burnout made mindful practices more appealing.

new_signals.title: Sound healing and vagus nerve stimulation emerge as major wellness trends for 2026
new_signals.summary: Sound healing set to strike chord in 2026 involving immersion in sound of chimes, gongs, crystal bowls. Focus on stimulating vagus nerve, key pathway in body's stress-regulation system.

new_signals.title: Emotional fitness treated like physical fitness with breathwork and nervous system regulation
new_signals.summary: Emotional wellness becoming proactive and preventive, treated like physical fitness with breathwork and mind-body practices focused on nervous system regulation.

new_signals.title: AI-powered meditation guides creating personalized practice with VR environments in 2026
new_signals.summary: Integration of meditation with advanced technologies including AI-driven personalization, wearable device compatibility, and VR environments enhancing user engagement.

new_signals.title: Victoria VR launches first Web3 metaverse on Apple Vision Pro with blockchain integration
new_signals.summary: Victoria VR attempting to merge Web3 and metaverse using Apple Vision Pro, representing one of first blockchain-based metaverse applications for platform.
new_signals.dedup_note: Signal RAW-2026-0112-048 has published_date of 2024-02-02, which is outside 3-day scan window (2026-01-10 to 2026-01-12). Should be excluded as not current news.

updated_signals.original_title: D-Wave, Quantum Circuits Inc. $5.5억 인수 - 양자컴퓨팅 통합 가속
updated_signals.update_title: D-Wave announces acquisition of Quantum Circuits Inc. for $550M to accelerate quantum computing
updated_signals.update_content: Official company announcement with detailed terms ($300M stock + $250M cash) and technical specifications about dual-rail system and on-chip cryogenic control.

updated_signals.original_title: NVIDIA Gr00t 2.0 및 Cosmos 휴머노이드 로봇 AI 발표
updated_signals.update_title: NVIDIA introduces Cosmos physical AI models and announces Vera Rubin AI superchip in production
updated_signals.update_content: Official newsroom announcement detailing complete product suite: Cosmos, GR00T, Isaac Lab-Arena, OSMO framework, plus Vera Rubin superchip platform specifications and Siemens partnership.

updated_signals.original_title: CRISPR Breakthrough: Gene Activation Without DNA Cutting
updated_signals.update_title: CRISPR epigenetic editing breakthrough: gene activation without DNA cutting
updated_signals.update_content: Academic source (ScienceDaily) providing detailed mechanism of UNSW Sydney epigenetic editing approach and clinical timeline for CRISPR Therapeutics CTX460 trial mid-2026.

updated_signals.original_title: Seed-stage AI startups receive 42% higher valuations than non-AI peers in 2026
updated_signals.update_title: Global venture capital deployment expected to increase 10% to high $400B in 2026
updated_signals.update_content: Crunchbase report confirming global VC deployment trajectory with specific data: $339.4B in 2025, projected $400B+ in 2026. American VCs allocating 65.4% to AI/ML with 14% concentrated in OpenAI/Anthropic.

updated_signals.original_title: 트럼프 주(州) AI 규제 견제 행정명령
updated_signals.update_title: Trump administration issues executive order preempting state AI laws, forms litigation task force
updated_signals.update_content: Legal briefing detailing implementation mechanisms: AI Litigation Task Force establishment within 30 days, targeting Colorado algorithmic discrimination legislation and other state-level AI laws for federal preemption challenge.

updated_signals.update_title: US-China relations enter 2026 with fragile trade truce, tech war intensifying over AI chips
updated_signals.update_content: CNBC newsletter update showing paradoxical developments: selective tariff reduction on 935 items from Jan 1 vs. intensifying tech competition over AI chips and Taiwan military balance.

updated_signals.update_title: EU AI Act transparency rules take effect August 2026, Digital Omnibus may extend high-risk timeline
updated_signals.update_content: IAPP policy analysis detailing Digital Omnibus proposals that may extend high-risk processing timeline from Aug 2026 to Dec 2027, with member state AI regulatory sandbox establishment by Aug 2, 2026.

updated_signals.original_title: Gen Z '아날로그의 해' 선언 - 의도적 삶과 느린 경험 추구
updated_signals.update_title: Gen Z: 86% striving to reduce screen time, 2026 becomes year of digital minimalism
updated_signals.update_content: Quantitative research from Brightn App: 86% of Gen Z across US and Europe actively striving for screen time reduction, with 81% of Gen Z workers believing digital detoxes should become routine workplace practice.

updated_signals.update_title: MZ세대 직장인 66.5%가 워라밸을 괜찮은 일자리 판단 1순위로 선택
updated_signals.update_content: Korean market data from No Cut News: 66.5% of respondents select work-life balance as top job quality criterion, with Bank of Korea report showing workplace conditions (31.5%) now outrank salary (26.8%) in job selection criteria.

updated_signals.original_title: '영성이 파티를 대체' - Gen Z/밀레니얼 나이트라이프 문화 전환
updated_signals.update_title: People choosing spirituality over partying in 2026, seeking mental peace and deeper meaning
updated_signals.update_content: Cultural analysis from Bharat Bhraman showing how social media normalization of spiritual content (devotional music, healing reels, influencer wellness journeys) drives mainstream adoption of spirituality over nightlife culture.

duplicate_signals.title: Seed-stage AI startups receive 42% higher valuations than non-AI peers in 2026
duplicate_signals.notes: URL exactly matches existing dedup_index.urls entry

duplicate_signals.title: Victoria VR launches first Web3 metaverse on Apple Vision Pro with blockchain integration
duplicate_signals.notes: Published 2024-02-02, outside 3-day scan window (2026-01-10 to 2026-01-12). Not current environmental scan data.

dedup_methodology.step_1_url_matching: Exact URL comparison against dedup-index (110 URLs). 46 unique URLs passed, 2 duplicates found.
dedup_methodology.step_2_title_similarity: Levenshtein distance calculation (threshold 0.85). Entity recognition for key terms.
dedup_methodology.step_3_entity_overlap: Cross-reference with dedup-index actors (47), technologies (34), policies (21). 10 signals flagged for entity-based updates.
dedup_methodology.step_4_content_review: For entity-match signals, detailed comparison of summaries and key developments. Categorized as UPDATE when new information added to existing signal.
dedup_methodology.consolidation_notes: Multiple related signals consolidated where appropriate (e.g., quantum computing sub-signals, humanoid robotics, Gen Z digital detox). Preserved original raw_ids for audit trail.

signal_consolidation_candidates.recommendation: Consider meta-signal consolidation on 'Quantum Computing Commercial Viability 2026' covering D-Wave acquisition, IBM advantage verification, and Korean corroboration.
Both CES 2026 physical AI announcements could feed into existing humanoid robots meta-signal in database.

signal_consolidation_candidates.topic: Gen Z Digital Detox and Work-Life Balance Movement
signal_consolidation_candidates.recommendation: Consolidate with existing SIG-2026-0110-015 and SIG-2026-0109-017 as coordinated global movement with regional variations.

next_scan_priorities: Monitor Q1 2026 quantum computing announcements and commercial deployments
Track CES 2026 follow-up product launches and market reception
Follow EU AI Act implementation timeline through August 2026
Monitor US-China diplomatic visits (Trump's April 2026 China trip)
Watch renewable energy transition metrics for mid-2026 coal overtaking milestone

processing_metadata.confidence_levels: All signals flagged with confidence scores based on source tier, publication date, and entity verification.
